title: [GAMEPLAY] Riot Girl Tristana texture/model bug
body:
As i was playing a few days ago as Tristana with the Riot Girl skin i noticed that whatever animation she is doing her cannon always sticks to her hand. For example when you do the animation taunt she would do a backflip and land on her gun, in my case she does the backflip holds the gun in her hand and stands in the air.
I don't know if the other skins have this problem too, but i do checked with the basic skin and there was no problem, only with the Riot Girl skin.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working on a fix!

It's really bad and ruins a lot of her animations.
Hotfix plz. I love this skin. :C
This issue won't be hotfixed, but we're working to resolve it ASAP!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VEPUlnlp,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-07-28T17:38:11.885+0000)
>
> This issue won't be hotfixed, but we're working to resolve it ASAP!

QQ. It's pretty huge, since the gun is like 60% of her, but oh well. I eagerly await this fix. Probably one of my favorite skins in the game.
You're right, her weapon is a focal point! However, since this isn't gameplay impacting (as it's appearing on her emotes/idle/death), it doesn't need to be disabled/hotfixed.
As long as it gets fixed, the method and the time doesn't really matter. At least for me. :D
It's not too different than her usual behavior, she's just stays in the air for a bit longer.
